Navigation
Name Test/Libraries/List/top
Synopsis Take the top element of a list.
Function &T top(list[&T] lst) throws EmptyList
Usage import List;
Description This function is identical to head. Also see pop and push.
Examples 
rascal>import List;
ok
rascal>top([3, 1, 4, 5]);
int: 3
rascal>top(["zebra", "elephant", "snake", "owl"]);
str: "zebra"

Questions
Question [1].
The type of top(["Strawberry", "Sesame"]) is

Question [2]. 
top([6, -16, 11, -5, 10]) ==
